original_text: His sons brought the blood to him, and he dipped his finger into the blood and put it on the horns of the altar; the rest of the blood he poured out at the base of the altar.
korean_text: 아론의 아들들이 그 피를 아론에게 가져오니 아론이 손가락으로 그 피를 찍어 제단 뿔들에 바르고 그 피는 제단 밑에 쏟고

sentences.original_text: His sons brought the blood to him
and he dipped his finger into the blood
and put it on the horns of the altar
the rest of the blood he poured out
at the base of the altar
